line_2: At me, thy poor, earth-born companion,
Nor the pride, nor ample pinion,
Nor the pride, nor ample pinion,

line_1: For Pompous Names, or wide Dominion;
There is not such a bitch in king George's dominion!
line_2: Said Thomas to Richard — to speak my opinion,
To rule by dint of dark opinion;

line_1: Spurning restraint, and grasping at dominion;
line_2: Prone to adopt and lead some new opinion,
